# z-app-header



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                               | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `drawer`  | `drawer`  | Collapse the menu container into a side drawer, for a better experience on mobile devices.                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `hero`    | `hero`    | Set the hero image source for the header. You can also use a slot="hero" node for advanced customisation. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `overlay` | `overlay` | Should place an overlay over the hero image. Useful for legibility purpose.                               | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `stuck`   | `stuck`   | Stuck mode for the header. You can programmatically set it using an IntersectionObserver.                 | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [z-icon](../../icons/z-icon)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  z-app-header --> z-icon
  style z-app-header fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
